title: A Research brief 2

description: Projects undertaken by the National Research Council of Canada. This film covers the development of a new meningitis vaccine; a process to extract protein from field peas; maintenance of the NRC cesium atomic clock, solar energy research, and grinding and polishing a 14-ton mirror for the Canada-France-Hawaii telescope. Photographers, John McAulay, Grant Crabtree, Ian McKain.
